original_title: A Small Dick Fleshy Ass Thang!
overview: A black man and a white woman lie naked in bed and taunt each other about 'small' versus 'big' and 'fleshy' versus 'tight'. A Small Dick Fleshy Ass Thang! subverts, inverts and ridicules racial stereotypes in the realm of the sexual. A hilarious poke at physical embarrassment.
title: A Small Dick Fleshy Ass Thang!
